title: Temperature Conversion
description: This function block performs temperature conversions from Kelvin to Celsius, Fahrenheit, Rankine, and Réaumur. The block takes an input temperature in Kelvin and converts it to other temperature scales using specified conversion formulas.
name: TEMPERATURE

input.name: C
input.description: Celsius conversion base value, initialized to -273.15.

input.name: F
input.description: Fahrenheit conversion base value, initialized to -459.67.

input.name: Re
input.description: Réaumur conversion base value, initialized to -218.52.
